actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 2 of the National Housing Act to provide for a guaranteed loan program designed to encourage the acquisition and installation of water conservation equipment and systems in dwelling units.

summary.text: Water Conservation in Homes Act - Amends the National Housing Act to provide guaranteed loans for housing improvement including water conservation equipment and systems which are designed to reduce the total water requirements of the structures and are in conformity with specified standards.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2 of the National Housing Act to provide for a guaranteed loan program designed to encourage the acquisition and installation of water conservation equipment and systems in dwelling units.
